A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was completely and utterly disappointed with this movie. The choices that were made were either not “Star Wars”\, didn’t make sense\, and/or weren’t needed for the story. There were so many continuity issues. For instance when bombs are dropped in space they sink..... yes because there’s gravity in space. Another example\, how do Finn and Rose know the rest of the rebels are leaving in the transports and why do they tell the sketchy “decoder”? Captain Phasma was useless. She was apparently a worse fighter than Finn who was a janitor in the last movie. They made Snoke to be important and then they killed him in 5 minutes. As is he couldn’t see Kylo’s intentions. I really could go on and on but who has the time. I really didn’t like this movie. Because of that I’m scared to watch episode 9. Disney is great and all\, but they ruined Star Wars. #NotMyStarWars
